<< append string type char >>

blanks

creates an string of blank characters.

Syntax

r = blanks(n)

Input argument

n

an value integer, number of blanks.

Output argument

r

a character array with n blanks

Description

blanks creates an string of blank characters.

Example

blanks(4)

See also

char.

History

Version Description
1.0.0 initial version

Author

Allan CORNET

<< append string type char >>
